statements.select:
select C_PLANSTATUS , C_PLANNO , C_MATERIALNO , C_MATERIALNAME , C_FROMDEPTNO , C_FROMDEPTNAME , C_FROMSTORENO , C_FROMSTORENAME , C_TODEPTNO , C_TODEPTNAME , C_TOSTORENO , C_TOSTORENAME , C_BELTNO , C_BELTNAME , C_SHIPNO , C_CONTRACTNO , C_VOYAGENO , C_STARTTIME , C_ENDTIME , C_CREATETIME , C_CREATENAME , C_REMARK , C_RESERVE1 , C_RESERVE2 , C_RESERVE3 , I_RESERVE1 , I_RESERVE2 , I_RESERVE3 , C_WGTLISTNO , N_STARTWGT , N_ENDWGT , N_NETWGT , C_MEASURESTARTTIME , C_MEASUREENDTIME , C_MEASUREMAN , C_UPDATEUSERNAME , C_UPDATETIME , C_BILLCREATETIME , C_BILLCREATEUSERNAME , I_INTID , I_BillStatus, C_RESERVE4, C_RESERVE5, C_RESERVE6, C_RESERVE7, C_RESERVE8, C_OPERATEIP, C_CHANGEDFIELDS, C_CHANGEDCONTENT, C_HISTORYUPDATEUSERNAME, C_HISTORYUPDATETIME from PM_BILL_BELT_HISTORY t where 1=1
t.C_PLANNO=#PlanNo#
t.C_WGTLISTNO=#WgtNo#
t.C_HISTORYUPDATETIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
order by t.C_HISTORYUPDATETIME desc
statements.insert:
select SEQ_PM_BILL_BELT_HISTORY_ID.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into PM_BILL_BELT_HISTORY (C_PLANSTATUS , C_PLANNO , C_MATERIALNO , C_MATERIALNAME , C_FROMDEPTNO , C_FROMDEPTNAME , C_FROMSTORENO , C_FROMSTORENAME , C_TODEPTNO , C_TODEPTNAME , C_TOSTORENO , C_TOSTORENAME , C_BELTNO , C_BELTNAME , C_SHIPNO , C_CONTRACTNO , C_VOYAGENO , C_STARTTIME , C_ENDTIME , C_CREATETIME , C_CREATENAME , C_REMARK , C_RESERVE1 , C_RESERVE2 , C_RESERVE3 , I_RESERVE1 , I_RESERVE2 , I_RESERVE3 , C_WGTLISTNO , N_STARTWGT , N_ENDWGT , N_NETWGT , C_MEASURESTARTTIME , C_MEASUREENDTIME , C_MEASUREMAN , C_UPDATEUSERNAME , C_UPDATETIME , C_BILLCREATETIME , C_BILLCREATEUSERNAME , I_INTID , I_BillStatus, C_RESERVE4, C_RESERVE5, C_RESERVE6, C_RESERVE7, C_RESERVE8, C_OPERATEIP, C_CHANGEDFIELDS, C_CHANGEDCONTENT, C_HISTORYUPDATEUSERNAME, C_HISTORYUPDATETIME ) values ( #C_Planstatus#, #C_Planno#, #C_Materialno#, #C_Materialname#, #C_Fromdeptno#, #C_Fromdeptname#, #C_Fromstoreno#, #C_Fromstorename#, #C_Todeptno#, #C_Todeptname#, #C_Tostoreno#, #C_Tostorename#, #C_Beltno#, #C_Beltname#, #C_Shipno#, #C_Contractno#, #C_Voyageno#, #C_Starttime#, #C_Endtime#, #C_Createtime#, #C_Createname#, #C_Remark#, #C_Reserve1#, #C_Reserve2#, #C_Reserve3#, #I_Reserve1#, #I_Reserve2#, #I_Reserve3#, #C_Wgtlistno#, #N_Startwgt#, #N_Endwgt#, #N_Netwgt#, #C_Measurestarttime#, #C_Measureendtime#, #C_Measureman#, #C_Updateusername#, #C_Updatetime#, #C_Billcreatetime#, #C_Billcreateusername#, #I_Intid#, #I_BillStatus#, #C_RESERVE4#, #C_RESERVE5#, #C_RESERVE6#, #C_RESERVE7#, #C_RESERVE8#, #c_operateIp#, #c_changedFields# , #c_changedContent# , #c_historyUpdateUserName# , #c_historyUpdateTime# )
statements.select: select C_PLANSTATUS , C_PLANNO , C_MATERIALNO , C_MATERIALNAME , C_FROMDEPTNO , C_FROMDEPTNAME , C_FROMSTORENO , C_FROMSTORENAME , C_TODEPTNO , C_TODEPTNAME , C_TOSTORENO , C_TOSTORENAME , C_BELTNO , C_BELTNAME , C_SHIPNO , C_CONTRACTNO , C_VOYAGENO , C_STARTTIME , C_ENDTIME , C_CREATETIME , C_CREATENAME , C_REMARK , C_RESERVE1 , C_RESERVE2 , C_RESERVE3 , I_RESERVE1 , I_RESERVE2 , I_RESERVE3 , C_WGTLISTNO , N_STARTWGT , N_ENDWGT , N_NETWGT , C_MEASURESTARTTIME , C_MEASUREENDTIME , C_MEASUREMAN , C_UPDATEUSERNAME , C_UPDATETIME , C_BILLCREATETIME , C_BILLCREATEUSERNAME , I_INTID , I_BillStatus, C_RESERVE4, C_RESERVE5, C_RESERVE6, C_RESERVE7, C_RESERVE8, C_OPERATEIP, C_CHANGEDFIELDS, C_CHANGEDCONTENT, C_HISTORYUPDATEUSERNAME, C_HISTORYUPDATETIME from PM_BILL_BELT_HISTORY t where I_INTID = #value#
